title: Britannia's pastorals. The first booke
author: Browne, William, 1590-ca. 1645.
notes: Book 2 has separate dated title page and pagination; register is continuous.
The title page to Book 2 is conjugate, with "Haviland" in the imprint. Variant 1: title page is a cancel, with "Haviland" in the imprint. Variant 2: title page is conjugate, with misprint "Havilad".
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
